cab.content: HIS DOCUIENT lb THE PROPERTY "OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY*S GOVERNMENT).I. Copy No *J5918.CABINET. AGRICULTURAL HOLDINGS BILL. MEMORANDUM BY THE MINISTER OF AGRICULTURE AND FISHERIES.When the Agriculture Act was before Parliament, an undertaking was given that as soon as possible the enactments relating to agricultural holdings in England and Wales and In Scotland respectively, should be consolidated, and a Bill for this purpose relating to Scotland has already been introduced. The Bill consolidating the enactments relating to agricultural holdings in England and Wales is in course of preparation and I desire to be allowed to introduce it at on early date. The Bill will be purely a consolidating measure and will not alter in any respect';the existing law, and unless the Committee so desire, I do not propose to circulate a draft of the Bill to the Committee.A.G. BOSCAKEN.April, 1922
